original_text: It was like that all the time. The cloud covered it during the day. But at night, the cloud seemed to have fire in it.
korean_text: 항상 그러하여 낮에는 구름이 그것을 덮었고 밤이면 불 모양이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: It was like that all the time
The cloud covered it during the day
the cloud seemed to have fire in it
sentences.korean_translation: 구름 안에 불이 있는 것처럼 보였습니다
